title: Kiribati? Here we are
creator_credit: John Shaw, Don Murray and Film Australia
brief_description: On 12 July 1979 the Gilbert Islands, in the Central Pacific Ocean, became independent from British rule. The film shows the way of life of the people and includes a brief historical background.
creator_credit_for_label: John Shaw, Don Murray and Film Australia
